channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP E-Commerce (SAP-CRMJAV, SAP-CRMWEB, SAP-SHRWEB, SAP-SHRJAV, SAP-CRMAPP, SAP-SHRAPP)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP E-Commerce (SAP-CRMJAV, SAP-CRMWEB, SAP-SHRWEB, SAP-SHRJAV, SAP-CRMAPP, SAP-SHRAPP)

item.title: CVE-2019-0298|2024-08-04T17:44:16.423Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20e-commerce%20%28sap-crmjav%2C%20sap-crmweb%2C%20sap-shrweb%2C%20sap-shrjav%2C%20sap-crmapp%2C%20sap-shrapp%29
item.description: SAP E-Commerce (Business-to-Consumer) application does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. Fixed in the following components SAP-CRMJAV SAP-CRMWEB SAP-SHRWEB SAP-SHRJAV SAP-CRMAPP SAP-SHRAPP, versions 7.30, 7.31, 7.32, 7.33, 7.54.
